short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Boost your email productivity with GmailPT, AI email assistant for all webmails like Gmail, Outlook, Yahoo, and more.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
From the creators of GeoTrack (email tracking with geolocation) and Gmail POP Sync (POP account synchronizer)—both extensions boasting more than 25,000 weekly users—we are now proud to present our latest extension, which completes our suite of Gmail tools: GmailPT, AI Email Assistant for all webmails like Gmail, Outlook, Yahoo, and more.

Elevate Your Email Experience with GmailPT: The Ultimate AI Email Assistant

Boost Productivity Across Gmail™ and Any Website: GmailPT transforms your email and web browsing into a high-efficiency workspace. Leveraging advanced AI, including GeminiPro and ChatGPT, our extension supercharges Gmail™, letting you manage your inbox and web content with unprecedented ease.



1. Comprehensive AI-Driven Features: Dive into a suite of powerful functionalities:

- AI-Driven Proofreading: Instantly eliminate grammatical errors and polish your text for a professional touch.

- Effortless Reply Generation: Craft contextually relevant responses with a single click.

- Seamless Translation: Break language barriers with real-time translation across nearly 40 languages.

- Intuitive Summarization & Explanation: Condense lengthy emails or articles and clarify complex concepts without leaving your inbox.

- Creative Email Composition: Generate engaging, original content from brief prompts, streamlining your email creation process.

- Versatility at Its Core: Originally designed for Gmail™, GmailPT's flexibility shines through its compatibility with all major webmail platforms (Outlook, Yahoo Mail, and more) and any webpage. Whether you're browsing the web or managing different email accounts, GmailPT adapts to your needs.



2. Powered by Leading AI Technology: At the heart of GmailPT are several cutting-edge AI models, such as GPT-3.5, Gemini Pro, GPT-3.5 Turbo, and GPT-4 Turbo. Each is selected for its ability to enhance your productivity and streamline your digital communication tasks.


3. Global Communication Made Easy: With multilingual support for nearly 40 languages, GmailPT ensures that you can communicate effectively, no matter where you are or who you're communicating with.


Ready to Transform Your Digital Communication? Install GmailPT today and experience the future of email and web interaction, powered by AI.


-------------------------------------------------------------------
09/11/2024 - Version 1.1.2.6
- Updated models to GPT-4o and GPT-4o-mini, resulting in a significantly reduced API pricing.

07/03/2024 - Version 1.1.2.5
- Fix for "Insert" function

29/02/20224 - Version 1.1.1.4
- Added "Write an email" feature

19/02/2024 - Version 1.1.2.3
- Fix for "Translate" feature
- Improved debugging for enhanced customer support

16/02/2024 - Version 1.1.2.2
- No code update
- Updated locales and description

14/02/2024 - Version 1.1.2.1
- Login and uninstall fixes

08/01/2024 - Version 1.1.2.0
- Fix on ChatGPT's token

06/01/2024 - Version 1.1.1.9
- Gemini Pro as default model
- Simplified login in ChatGPT from Options page

05/01/2024 - Version 1.1.1.8
- Updated Locales
- The OpenAI model gpt-3.5-turbo-1106 has been updated to gpt-3.5-turbo-0125, which is more economical.
- The OpenAI model gpt-4-1106-preview has been updated to gpt-4-0125-preview, which is also more economical.
- The sign-in process has been simplified.

31/01/2024 - Version 1.1.1.7
Removed ChatGPT popup due to OpenAI's discontinuation of framing

30/01/2024 - Version 1.1.1.6
First release
long.es,fr:
Transform your Gmail and any website into a productivity powerhouse with AI-driven proofreading, effortless reply, translation, summarization, and more!

GmailPT offers a range of functionalities. You can select text within Gmail or any website and use GmailPT to proofread this text, reply to it, translate it, obtain a detailed explanation, or summarize it. Additionally, you can compose emails, send various prompts, and access ChatGPT directly through a convenient popup window with just one click.

While GmailPT was originally tailored for Gmail, it is versatile enough to work on all webmails and any webpages.

We offer several AI models, including GPT-3.5, Gemini Pro, GPT-3.5 Turbo, and GPT-4 Turbo, among others.

Moreover, GmailPT supports multilingual functionality, accommodating nearly 40 different languages.


First, we put at your disposition several AI models such as Gemini Pro, ChatGPT 3.5 Turbo, ChatGPT 4 Turbo. Once our extension is installed, just select any text or email and instantly you can proofread this text, reply to it, translate it, obtain a detailed explanation, or summarize it. Additionally, you can compose emails, send various prompts, and access ChatGPT, from any website, directly through a convenient popup window with just one click.
